document.heading: Compassionate Release Authorization Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-318, the “Compassionate Release Authorization Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-525. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 10, 2012, and Sept. 19, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Oct. 10, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-479 and transmitted to Congress for its review on Nov. 1, 2012, and re-transmitted on March 5, 2013. D.C. Law 19-318 became effective on June 15, 2013.
